languages.text: "Смотри на это так, моя остроухая и элегантная ксеноподруга. Ты познакомилась поближе с культурой Империума. Ну а я добыла нам пропуск на несколько мест в очереди. Не украла! Просто... тихо обменяла, пока никто не видел".

traits.locale_text: "Смотри на это так, моя остроухая и элегантная ксено-подруга. Ты познакомилась поближе с культурой Империума. Ну а я добыла нам пропуск на несколько мест в очереди. Не украла! Просто... тихо обменяла, пока никто не видел".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."
languages.original_text: "Смотри на это так, моя остроухая и элегантная ксеноподруга. Ты познакомилась поближе с культурой Империума. Ну а я добыла нам пропуск на несколько мест в очереди. Не украла! Просто... тихо обменяла, пока никто не видел".

traits.locale_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我长着尖耳朵、举止优雅的异形朋友啊，你可以从这个角度看待这件事情——这可以帮助你更加深入地了解帝国文化。趁这段时间，我已经替我们弄到了一张新的叫号票，让我们往前排了几个位置。我可没有偷东西！我只是……趁没人注意的时候，把我们的票和别人的票换了一下而已。”
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: “我长着尖耳朵、举止优雅的异形朋友啊，你可以从这个角度看待这件事情——这可以帮助你更加深入地了解帝国文化。趁这段时间，我已经替我们弄到了一张新的叫号票，让我们往前排了几个位置。我可没有偷东西！我只是……趁没人注意的时候，把我们的票和别人的票换了一下而已。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Míralo así, mi xenoamiga elegante de orejas puntiagudas: tú has obtenido un conocimiento más detallado de la cultura del Imperium y yo nos he conseguido un número que nos permite saltarnos unos cuantos puestos en la cola. ¡No lo he robado! Solo lo he... cambiado por el nuestro cuando nadie miraba».
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: «Míralo así, mi xenoamiga elegante de orejas puntiagudas: tú has obtenido un conocimiento más detallado de la cultura del Imperium y yo nos he conseguido un número que nos permite saltarnos unos cuantos puestos en la cola. ¡No lo he robado! Solo lo he... cambiado por el nuestro cuando nadie miraba».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「こう考えてみてはどうかしら。このとがったお耳の品行方正な異種族の友を見よ、ってね。陛下は帝国の文化にかなり詳しくなった。あたしはお陰で2、3か所先の列から番号札をいただけた。盗んだわけじゃないないわ！ちょーっと…あたしたちのものと交換しただけよ、誰も見てないうちにね」
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: 「こう考えてみてはどうかしら。このとがったお耳の品行方正な異種族の友を見よ、ってね。陛下は帝国の文化にかなり詳しくなった。あたしはお陰で2、3か所先の列から番号札をいただけた。盗んだわけじゃないないわ！ちょーっと…あたしたちのものと交換しただけよ、誰も見てないうちにね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tâchez plutôt de voir le verre à moitié plein, mon élégante amie xénos aux oreilles pointues. Vous avez là un bon aperçu de la culture impériale, et moi, je nous ai déniché un ticket qui va nous permettre de gagner plusieurs places d'un coup. Non, je ne l'ai pas volé ! Je l'ai juste... échangé avec le nôtre quand tout le monde avait le dos tourné. »
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: « Tâchez plutôt de voir le verre à moitié plein, mon élégante amie xénos aux oreilles pointues. Vous avez là un bon aperçu de la culture impériale, et moi, je nous ai déniché un ticket qui va nous permettre de gagner plusieurs places d'un coup. Non, je ne l'ai pas volé ! Je l'ai juste... échangé avec le nôtre quand tout le monde avait le dos tourné. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst das anders sehen, werte spitzohrige und elegante Xenofreundin – Ihr habt dadurch mehr über die Kultur des Imperiums gelernt. Und ich habe eine Wartenummer, die uns in der Schlange einige Plätze nach vorne bringt. Ich habe sie nicht gestohlen! Lediglich ... ausgetauscht, als niemand hergesehen hat."
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst das anders sehen, werte spitzohrige und elegante Xenofreundin – Ihr habt dadurch mehr über die Kultur des Imperiums gelernt. Und ich habe eine Wartenummer, die uns in der Schlange einige Plätze nach vorne bringt. Ich habe sie nicht gestohlen! Lediglich ... ausgetauscht, als niemand hergesehen hat."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şöyle düşün keskin kulaklı ve zarif zeno dostum... İmparatorluk'un kültürü hakkında yakından bilgi edinmiş oldun. Ben de bizi kuyrukta biraz ileriye alan bir fiş buldum. Çaldım demiyorum! Sadece... Kimse bakmazken kendi fişimizle değiştirdim."
languages.original_text: "Look at it this way, my pointy-eared and elegant xenofriend — you have gained more intimate knowledge of the Imperium's culture. And I have got us a ticket that puts us a few places ahead in the queue. I didn't steal it! I simply... swapped it with ours when no one was looking."

traits.locale_text: "Şöyle düşün keskin kulaklı ve zarif zeno dostum... İmparatorluk'un kültürü hakkında yakından bilgi edinmiş oldun. Ben de bizi kuyrukta biraz ileriye alan bir fiş buldum. Çaldım demiyorum! Sadece... Kimse bakmazken kendi fişimizle değiştirdim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
